Package: org.gradle.api.tasks.compile

[Java] Class JavaCompile

        • org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.JavaCompile

        • Compiles Java source files. 

               apply plugin: 'java'
     compileJava {
         //enable compilation in a separate daemon process
         options.fork = true
     }
